body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Automotive, my name is Eric Green. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Eric, my name is Margaret Clark.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Margaret. Before we proceed, may I kindly ask for your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, my phone number is five five five - four six nine - two three zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. And may I also have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is mclark@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Margaret. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today regarding your billing query?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling confused about some of the charges on my recent invoice.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Margaret. Let me review your billing information to assist you better. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Margaret. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
